com.wj.android.messageviewer.gui

Class NoArrowBubble

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wj.android.messageviewer.gui.ArrowBubble
      • com.wj.android.messageviewer.gui.NoArrowBubble

  • public class NoArrowBubble
extends ArrowBubble
    Subclass of ArrowBubble that will display a message info as a conversation bubble with no arrow.
    Author:
    Werner Jaeger
